about_the_game:
Play first hand the demo version of EstradaBus HD, a bus simulator developed by Estrada Digital Games.

The simulator produced by Estrada Digital Games has a very simple proposal: the transport of passengers on maps of cities and fields, crossing beautiful scenarios through various models of buses available in the game.

The demonstration initially has two bus models, a map and some snacks present in the early access version of EstradaBus.

A bus simulator with beautiful scenery!


  • You can drive between paved roads and dirt roads:
  • Relax and drive! xD!
detailed_description:
Play first hand the demo version of EstradaBus HD, a bus simulator developed by Estrada Digital Games.

The simulator produced by Estrada Digital Games has a very simple proposal: the transport of passengers on maps of cities and fields, crossing beautiful scenarios through various models of buses available in the game.

The demonstration initially has two bus models, a map and some snacks present in the early access version of EstradaBus.

A bus simulator with beautiful scenery!


  • You can drive between paved roads and dirt roads:
  • Relax and drive! xD!
name: EstradaBus HD Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel I3 3210 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics/NVIDIA GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Changes may occuring in complete version or early access
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5 4600 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950/AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Changes may occuring in complete version or early access

short_description: Inspired by tropical scenarios, EstradaBus brings simulation of buses and other passenger transport vehicles. Play the demo version and get to know our work!
